content: Hi! I've been in the help queue since 3 pm and I went from 76 to 32 but was stuck in that position for the past 2 hours. Since then I've been booted from the page and can no longer access the help queue at all. I'm trying to get my pset3 checkoff in by the 9 pm deadline tonight. What do I do?
subject: help queue glitched -- waited 2 hours no progress

content: Pset 3 checkoff has been extended for everyone till tomorrow 5 pm. In addition, they are working on a fix for queue
